programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Second Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Coverage of the opening day's play in the Second Test of the four-match series, which takes place at Trent Bridge in Nottingham. These sides last met on this ground in the longest format of the game back in 2003, when the home side recorded a 70-run victory to level the five-match series at 1-1. First-innings centuries from Mark Butcher and captain Nasser Hussain helped build the foundation for that victory, with the series eventually finishing 2-2.(n)
